question: how can technology help make roads safer?

clueweb22-en0011-20-18864.point_content: Companion app allows users to choose companions who can track their location as they journey home, promoting safety by notifying companions when the user reaches home or if help is needed.
spans: Companion, a new app for anyone worried about walking home alone, promotes the buddy system by letting users choose “companions” -- people in their contacts who they can choose to track their location as they journey home.
Companion acts as a tracking app, allowing users to map their starting and ending locations.
Users can add friends, family or even police officers to be "companions," and these companions follow the user on a map until they reach their destination.
Once the person reaches home, their companions will be automatically notified, however if something happens they can send help your way.

clueweb22-en0011-20-18864.point_content: Rudder is a mapping app that finds the shortest and best-lit path between two points, using public light data and a smartphone's camera light meter to ensure safer walking routes.
spans: Rudder is a mapping app with an emphasis on walking directions.
The algorithm behind it doesn’t simply calculate the shortest path between two points, it figures out the shortest and best-lit path between the points.
Rudder does this by comparing routes to a database containing information about a given city's public light data.

The app will never take you more than a few minutes out of your way, and it even taps into your smartphone's camera to give you a built-in light meter, letting you know how well-lit your route really is.

clueweb22-en0011-20-18864.point_content: Driver’s Little Helper is an electronic monitoring system that syncs with your phone to monitor car seat pressure, temperature and movement, sending alerts to keep children safe in cars.
spans: Driver’s Little Helper is an electronic monitoring system that works via an app for iPhone or Android.
Using wireless Bluetooth technology, the Driver’s Little Helper car seat monitor syncs with your phone to help you keep your most precious cargo safe.
The car seat monitor pad measures pressure, temperature and movement and will send you alerts through a free app on your phone.

clueweb22-en0021-87-15643.point_content: LIDAR guns help law enforcers catch and book vehicles that cross the speed limit by emitting an invisible infrared beam to estimate vehicle speed accurately and quickly.
spans: LIDAR (Light Detection and Ranging) gun is a tool that helps law enforcers to catch and book vehicles that cross the speed limit.
The gun emits an invisible infrared beam which can target an individual vehicle and estimate whether it is violating the speed limit or not based on variations recorded in the light.
The device takes less than a second to estimate a vehicle’s speed and is quite accurate.

clueweb22-en0021-87-15643.point_content: Speed Indication Displays inform vehicles of their speed relative to the limit using radar sensors and LED displays, helping prevent speeding.
spans: Speed Indication Displays are digital speed boards that are installed on roads to inform vehicles whether they are under the limit or not.
Most of these types of devices are fitted with a radar sensor which is able to estimate the speed of vehicles and displays this information on a LED display for the vehicles.

clueweb22-en0021-87-15643.point_content: Speed governors are devices installed in commercial vehicles that cap the maximum speed by restricting air and fuel flow to the engine when the speed limit is exceeded.
spans: Speed governors are essentially devices which put a cap on the speed that can be achieved that is below the vehicle’s natural maximum speed.
The device has a series of sensors that can detect how fast a vehicle is going and if this crosses the limit set by it, it restricts the flow of air and fuel to the engine.

clueweb22-en0021-87-15643.point_content: Variable Message Signs are LED boards that display important real-time information to commuters about road and traffic conditions.
spans: Variable Message Signs are LED boards which can display important information that needs to be communicated to commuters.
These can be used to update road users on the real-time road and traffic conditions in the case of major breakdowns, congestions, and so on.

clueweb22-en0021-87-15643.point_content: Inductive loops embedded in roads detect vehicles at junctions and communicate with traffic signals to adjust signal changes based on traffic conditions.
spans: When embedded in the surface of the road, induction loops can help in traffic control by detecting when there are vehicles waiting at a junction and sending this information to traffic signals which can then change according to the on-ground situation.
These loops make use of electromagnetic fields which experience a change in frequency when a vehicle enters the area.
